# ufe-avatar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute | Description                                                              | Type     | Default     |
| ------------ | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `avatarsUrl` | `svc`     | The Uri of the service - md5 hash of the email will be added to this uri | `string` | `undefined` |
| `email`      | `email`   | The avatar email - used to identify user icon                            | `string` | `undefined` |
| `size`       | `size`    | The size of the avatar in pixels                                         | `string` | `"64px"`    |
